name: A Diary From The Past
description:
Game Studio1 Project, Visual Novel by Yining Li

Takes about 10 mins, please have the sound on

*********************************************

Reading a diary from the past. 

*Your choices will be reflected in future dialogues and stories*

A Reality-Free game. This content is 100% fictional. Nothing involves with real life matters. 

*********************************************

Some background story: 

A young traveler found pieces of diary written in a foreign language across different place. Fortunately, the traveler knows an elder sorcerer who can read those words. 

*********************************************
